ygData.subject: Re: Bard Changes
ygData.msgSnippet: Not to mention that it ll be a heck of a lot easier keeping everyone in range of Accelerando when traveling across zones. -Alex aka: Goatnatos, lvl 19 Bard,
ygData.messageBody:
Not to mention that it'll be a heck of a lot easier keeping everyone in
range of Accelerando when traveling across zones.

-Alex
aka: Goatnatos, lvl 19 Bard, Povar Server
----- Original Message -----
From: Wayne Sheppard <mrwayne@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, June 04, 1999 5:22 PM
Subject: [eqbards] Bard Changes


> From: "Wayne Sheppard" <mrwayne@...>
>
> One of the other changes that will help bards is the /follow command. I
> know that I have to keep looking back for my night-blind human friends
> trying to follow me. This will make things much easier for me.
>
>
> Luti, lvl 12, Rathe
>
>
